get_kth_point_on_shortest_path(dst_node_id, k)[source]

Returns node at the len - k position on minimum path to given destination node.

Parameters

  • dst_node_id (int,) – The node to start computing predecessors from.

  • k (int,) – Steps to go back.

Raises

ValueError – If the predecessors vector was not requested.
